attributes.type: literal_string "Initialises a capped STO. Init parameters are _startTime (time STO starts), _endTime (time STO ends), _cap (cap in tokens for STO), _rate (POLY/ETH to token rate), _fundRaiseType (whether you are raising in POLY or ETH), _polyToken (address of POLY token), _fundsReceiver (address which will receive funds)"
attributes.value: Initialises a capped STO. Init parameters are _startTime (time STO starts), _endTime (time STO ends), _cap (cap in tokens for STO), _rate (POLY/ETH to token rate), _fundRaiseType (whether you are raising in POLY or ETH), _polyToken (address of POLY token), _fundsReceiver (address which will receive funds)
